page.title: 07Farms and Farming
page.content: Many of the farms are managed by tenants on the Mountgarrett estate. Farmhouses are usually stone built. Brearton has a large amount of rough grazing,otherwise the farming is mixed, with both cattle and sheep. Crops include hay, summer and winter wheat,sugar beet, potatoes and rapeseed. At Occaney, Walkingham Hill Farm is largely ploughed land with some deciduous wooded areas. Quarry Farm at Farnham grows soft fruit for sale to the public, sometimes on a "Pick-Your-Own" basis. Goats graze on Brearton village green.
